commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: I'm back from talking to the Committee! They're taking back their decision to cancel the festival!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: For real?!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Good work, Mari! I guess only the school chairwoman could convince them that quickly!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: The chairwoman? Who's that?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Mari is. She's a third-year student at the school, but she's also the chairwoman of it, too!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Wh-What?! A student, the chairwoman, and a school idol? Wh-What kind of life do you live?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: *Giggle* It's always best for a girl to have some mystery to her.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Aqours is a fearsome group.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: We're not all like that!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: But with all the work we're putting into cleaning up the town and repairs, we're going to have to scale it down.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: That's okay. It's more than enough that they reconsidered canceling it.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: That's right. We have to do everything we can to get the festival started as soon as possible.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: They're going to call for help with cleaning and repairs over the town P.A.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: The town P.A.? I remember announcing our live shows on that when Aqours was just Riko, Chika and me. How nostalgic.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: That's much easier than going around door to door, zura!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Great! I was worried about whether I could talk to all those people I didn't know.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: It would've taken all day to go door to door.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hey, Mari. Do you think I can make the announcement?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I was the one that suggested we work with everyone in the town, so I want to take the responsibility of asking for their help.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Are you really saying that now?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: You're not the only one that's going to be the hero.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Have you thought about what you're going to say?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: U-Umm...

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: We all feel the same way about this. Let's go together.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: ...Okay!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Garbage bags, check! Tongs, check! Gloves, check! Let's get some trash!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Yeah!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You're all such go-getters.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Well, it's better than skulking around, considering how they've officially announced that the festival is on.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: I wonder if everyone heard the announcement. I hope a lot of people show up.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: We told them how we feel about it. Now, we just have to do everything we can!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Whoa, I heard things were scattered around, but this is really bad!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: The typhoon winds might have kicked around some garbage cans.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: All the paper lanterns are gone. Did they get blown away?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I assume they took them down before the typhoon came. We have to put those back up, too.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: There are plastic umbrellas everywhere. It certainly looks like the aftermath of a typhoon.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: We'll have to break them down and dispose of them in their proper areas, zura. The poles are metal and the plastic has to go into plastic recycling.

commands.speaker: Townsperson A
commands.line: Everyone, bring the umbrellas over here!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko, Hanamaru
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: Townsperson B
commands.line: There are a lot of broken umbrellas thanks to the typhoon, so let's just get them all in one place for now.

commands.speaker: Townsperson A
commands.line: We won't let a little typhoon ruin our festival! Let's get to working on cleaning this place up!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Y-Yeah...!

commands.speaker: Tourist
commands.line: Excuse me, can I buy some garbage bags at the convenience store?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: What? Why not use one of these? We have plenty of extras!

commands.speaker: Tourist
commands.line: Are you sure? Thank you. I heard the announcement before. I came here for the festival, so I thought I'd help out!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Thank you so much!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Hey, is that person a tourist?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: This is amazing. Not only Numazu locals, but even tourists are helping!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I really want to take a picture of this. Everyone working together for the festival... I want this to be a moment people remember.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Good idea! Go for it, photographer!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Just leave it to me!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Hey, let's gather all the big garbage and bring it to a storage spot.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Kanan, is this a wagon? Where did you get this?

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: A store owner in town brought it over for us. They said it'd be easier than taking each piece by hand.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: People lent us all sorts of tools. It's a big help!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Not only the store owners, but many other people are lending tools from their houses, too.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: All the locals and everyone looking forward to the festival heard our wishes.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm glad we didn't give up and did what we could. Our hopes helped us reach our goal.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Okay! Let's clean all this stuff up and get the festival started! Let's bring our hopes and wishes to the festival!
